about.title: ABOUT ME
about.bio1: Angel Hernandez (Panama City, Panama) is a passionate *software developer* with experience in *web development*, *data analysis*, and *IT projects*. He is currently pursuing a *Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering* and holds certifications in *AWS*, *Data Analysis*, and *Machine Learning*.
about.bio2: He worked as a *Front-End Developer* at *[Riservi]*, where he participated in building features from scratch, collaborating with UI/UX designers. His notable project was developing a *survey system* similar to SurveyMonkey with response modules, reports, and statistics.
about.bio3: Previously, he worked as a *Developer and IT* at *Arauz C. & Asociados*, where he developed *Excel scripts with Visual Basic* to automate accounting workflows and created *APIs for QuickBooks*. He masters technologies like *React*, *Next.js*, *TypeScript*, *Python*, *FastAPI*, *SQL*, *MongoDB*, and *Supabase*.

riservi.title: More about Riservi
riservi.description: **Riservi** is a company where I worked as a **Front-End Developer**, actively participating in backend logic planning and creating new features from scratch. I developed a complete **survey system** with response modules, reports, and statistics.

arauz.title: More about Arauz C. & Asociados
arauz.description: **Arauz C. & Asociados** is an accounting firm where I worked as a **Developer and IT**. I developed Excel scripts with Visual Basic to automate accounting workflows, created **APIs for QuickBooks**, and performed IT tasks including monitoring and server improvements.
